AgentInstruct-alfworld.Paper Title: ALFWorld: Aligning Text and Embodied Environments for Interactive Learning
AgentInstruct-alfworld.License Notes: The ALFRED dataset that was used is licensed under the MIT License https://github.com/askforalfred/alfred/tree/master and the TextWorld framework used is licensed in some cases under MIT License https://github.com/microsoft/TextWorld/blob/main/LICENSE.txt and in some cases https://github.com/alfworld/alfworld/issues/48 under GPL 2.0, which is not relevant for ALFworld. To combine ALFRED with TextWorld, the authors created text-based analogs of each ALFRED scene.

AgentInstruct-webshop.Paper Title: WebShop: Towards Scalable Real-World Web Interaction with Grounded Language Agents
AgentInstruct-webshop.License Notes: The authors collected data on various products from Amazon.com and retrieved text and crowdsourced instructions from annotators. It is possible that some of these annotations have additional licenses. Therefore, the license pertains to the framework that was used to create the dataset and is mentioned by the authors.

AgentInstruct-knowledgegraph.License Notes: The paper https://arxiv.org/pdf/2308.03688.pdf cites an anonymous source from 2023 on page four that is currently under review. It is unclear what that means for the license. The original Freebase dataset, which seems to be a part of the source, is licensed under the Creative Commmon Attribution License.

AgentInstruct-operatingsystem.License Notes: The paper cited as the source for the dataset in the collection refers to a data source that includes Stack Overflow. However, the authors of the paper do not mention this in the actual paper, which raises the possibility that they created the dataset solely with GPT. As of now, it is underspecified.

AgentInstruct-database.License Notes: The original paper does not provide any information regarding its license. The paper cited for this task https://arxiv.org/pdf/2308.03688.pdf has created the dataset using additional datasets, but it is not clear which of those additional datasets were utilized to create this dataset on databases.

AgentInstruct-mind2web.Paper Title: Mind2Web: Towards a Generalist Agent for the Web
AgentInstruct-mind2web.License Notes: The license is specifically mentioned by the authors in the repository.
